formalpara.title: Figure 5: Inclusion of attB1 linker between GFP and ORF can affect distribution of fusion protein.
formalpara.para: The pie-1 promoter and tbb-2 3'UTR drive expression in all germ cells. However depending on the configuration of the attB sites, the fusion protein will behave differently. If the attB1 site is placed between GFP and H2B, the resulting fusion protein is unstable in pachytene nuclei (B). The attB2 site, however, does not cause this problem (A).
